items.content_html: MUI Stepper Pro is a fully customizable and lightweight stepper component built for React and Material-UI. Designed for flexibility and ease of use, it supports dynamic steps, validations, and smooth transitions. Whether you're building multi-step forms or interactive wizards, this open-source stepper makes navigation seamless.

Designed for flexibility and ease of use, it supports dynamic steps, validations, and smooth transitions. Whether you're building multi-step forms or interactive wizards, this open-source stepper makes navigation seamless.
